```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(dplyr)
```

Chargement des données
```{r}
 
setwd("C:/Users/fanny/OneDrive/Documents/Cours/PenseeCritique/Presences2025")
d1<- read.csv2("export1.csv")
d2<- read.csv2("export2.csv")
d3<- read.csv2("export3.csv")
d4<- read.csv2("export4.csv") 
d5<- read.csv2("export5.csv")

summary(d1)

d1$X<-factor(d1$X)
d2$X<-factor(d2$X)
d3$X<-factor(d3$X)
d4$X<-factor(d4$X)
d5$X<-factor(d5$X)



```

Faire le tableau agrégé
```{r}
d.complet <- merge(d1, d2, by = "X")
d.complet <- merge(d.complet, d3, by = "X")
d.complet <- merge(d.complet, d4, by = "X")
d.complet <- merge(d.complet, d5, by = "X")
head(d.complet)
d.complet$Nom<-d.complet$X

names(d.complet)[1] <- "Nom"
names(d.complet)[5]<-"NumEtudiant"

d<- select(d.complet,Nom, NumEtudiant  )

write.csv2(d, file="presence2025FUA.csv")
```
